name: itachi-memory
description: Persistent memory for Claude Code sessions. Automatically tracks file changes, stores them in Supabase with OpenAI embeddings, and retrieves relevant context at session start.

scripts.build: cd eliza && bun install && bun run build && cd ../orchestrator && npm install && npm run build
scripts.restart: cd orchestrator && npm install && npm run build && (pm2 restart itachi-orchestrator || pm2 start dist/index.js --name itachi-orchestrator)
scripts.update: git pull && cd eliza && bun install && bun run build && cd ../orchestrator && npm install && npm run build && (pm2 restart itachi-orchestrator || pm2 start dist/index.js --name itachi-orchestrator)
